title: Pop 101
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Spanish, Portuguese
description: Established in 2014, this is a vegetarian restaurant and bar with options for vegans and gluten-free guests. Offers a variety of comfort foods like fritatta and burgers along with finger foods and tapas like bruschetta and vegan cheese. Large selection of beer and wine. It is also a space dedicated to music, cinema, and arts, with video projections, books consultation. Has Wi-Fi. Look for it as it might be a bit hidden.
